Posts.Content: peace4friend wrote: I am scared to death the doctors found a 2.1cm lump in my breat that needed further evaluation..After evaluating it further with ultrasound and anothe mammo. They sat me down and told me it could possibly be cancer. I am waiting to talk to the surgeon about the biopsy. My question is, is a 2.1 cm lump considered large. I was so stunned and upset I could not think of questions to ask the dr at the time. Also I have itching and pain in that breast. Are these signs? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Newly found lump waiting for biopsy peace4friend janajones
